name: Everlast (Antony Melendez)
description:
INFO:

This is my second game ever made that Im willing to put out there so people can play it, it's currently under development at the moment I just have a working prototype that you guys can try out but I do want to make this into a finish and fully playable game.  The game was maninly inspired by the tower defence tutorials from Brackeys.

CONTROLS:

WASD - camera

P/ESC - Pause

Mouse - Building
